competitor_analysis.strengths: Strong domain authority, comprehensive restoration services including garage upgrades, 24/7 emergency service, insurance claim assistance, nationwide presence with local franchises.
competitor_analysis.weaknesses: Website navigation issues with broken links (404s), focuses heavily on disaster restoration rather than proactive upgrades, pricing not transparent, limited garage-specific content.

Before/after gallery of garage transformations in South Florida
Cost calculator for different garage upgrade options

competitor_analysis.strengths: Specialized focus on garage services, door installation expertise, manufacturer partnerships, warranty programs.
competitor_analysis.weaknesses: Limited content marketing, website design appears outdated, no clear service area coverage map, minimal social proof.
content_gaps: Complete garage remodeling process guide for Miami homes
Seasonal maintenance tips for South Florida garage doors
Case studies featuring Miami garage upgrade projects

competitor_analysis.strengths: Local presence, garage door expertise, variety of door styles and brands, installation services.
competitor_analysis.weaknesses: Website appears to have technical issues, limited online visibility, no clear pricing information, minimal educational content.
content_gaps: Interactive garage design tool for Miami homeowners
Detailed comparison of garage door materials for tropical climate
Guide to integrating smart garage technology

garage_upgrade.seasonality: Moderate seasonality with peaks in late fall/early winter and late summer, reflecting home improvement planning and post-hurricane season upgrades.

miami_garage_doors.seasonality: Higher interest in March-April and throughout summer months, indicating hurricane preparedness and home improvement seasons.

recommendations.rationale: Strong seasonal demand with clear content gaps in tropical climate-specific guidance. Moderate competition with opportunities in local pack and educational content. Revenue potential through diverse garage upgrade services.
content_plan_90_days: Month 1: Foundation content on 'Miami Garage Upgrade Planning Guide', 'Best Garage Flooring for South Florida'.
Month 2: Competitive gap content: 'Hurricane-Resistant Garage Doors Miami', 'Smart Garage Technology Guide Miami'.
Month 3: Authority building: 'Complete Miami Garage Remodeling Timeline', 'Cost vs Value: Garage Upgrades That Pay Off'.
